PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-03762013-04-18,  AAFC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPlant Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Plant Protection Regulations and the Plum Pox Virus Compensation Regulations, 2004
PrecisRegulations Amending the PLANT PROTECTION REGULATIONS AND THE PLUM POX VIRUS COMPENSATION REGULATIONS, 2004 in order to (1) bring the provincial and scientific names in Schedules I and II of the Plant Protection Regulations up to date with current provincial and scientific nomenclature in order to clarify the application of movement prohibitions and restrictions; and (2) extend the eligibility period in the Plum Pox Virus Compensation Regulations, 2004 to provide Canadian stone fruit growers compensation for the removal of trees affected by Plum Pox Virus.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0070 Publication Date: 2013-05-08
AttachmentsAttachment
